The name of the property which changed

summary.para: Provides a base class to automate the IsDirty, MarkAsClean and InitializeProperties functionality Note that this class does not support INotifyPropertyChanged and is not intented to host owned properties (though nothing prevents you from doing so)

member.name: P:W.PropertyHost.IsDirty
member.summary: Finds all Properties and checks their IsDirty flag
member.returns: True if any Property's IsDirty flag is true. Otherwise false.

member.name: M:W.PropertyHost.MarkAsClean
member.summary: Uses reflection to find all Properties and mark them as clean (call Property.MarkAsClean())

member.name: M:W.PropertyHost.#ctor
member.summary: Calls PropertyHostMethods.InitializeProperties so you don't have to

member.name: T:W.PropertyHostMethods
member.summary: Exposes static PropertyHost extension methods

summary.para: Scans the fields and properties of "owner" and sets the member's Owner property to "owner" This method should be called in the constructor of any class which has IOwnedProperty members

member.name: M:W.PropertyHostMethods.IsDirty(System.Object)

summary.para: Scans the IsDirty value of each field and property of type IProperty

member.returns: True if any IProperty member's IsDirty value is true, otherwise false

summary.para: Scans each field and property of type IProperty and sets it's IsDirty flag to false
Provides a base class to automate the IsDirty, MarkAsClean and InitializeProperties functionality Note that this class inherits PropertyChangedNotifier for INotifyPropertyChanged support

summary.para: A Gated thread. Execution of the Action will proceed when the Run method is called.

member.summary: The Action to execute when the thread completes

member.name: T:W.ExtensionMethods
member.summary: Tungsten extension methods

member.name: M:W.ExtensionMethods.Lock``1(``0,System.Action{``0})
member.summary: Performs the given action in a lock statement using the provided object for the lock
member.typeparam: The type of object on which the lock is made
member.param: The object to use in the lock
The action to perform in a lock statement
member.code: someValue.Lock(value => { value += 10; }); //lock on someValue and pass it into the action

member.name: M:W.ExtensionMethods.WaitForValue(System.Object,System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initiates a Task which will wait for the given variable to have the specified value
member.param: The value being inspected
The value to wait for
The task will time out within the specified number of milliseconds. Use -1 to wait indefinitely.
member.returns: True if the value was acquired within the specified timeout, otherwise False

member.name: M:W.ExtensionMethods.WaitForValue``1(``0,System.Predicate{``0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Initiates a Task which will wait for the specified condition to be met
member.param: The value being inspected
The condition to be met
The task will time out within the specified number of milliseconds. Use -1 to wait indefinitely.
member.returns: True if the condition was met within the specified timeout, otherwise False
